column4: wtf? I have 128 M in my lappy.. it's a bit slow but still useable.. as long as I don't open more than a couple of programs at a time
hehe.. two or three min, yeah. It's a bit slow to boot and stuff too.. I really need 512M and it would be sweet
what desktop manager do you run on that, I've got an old laptop, sounds like a simlar spec to that, works great with xfce, gnome was a bit slow
yeah, gnome .. it would probably be quite OK with xfce but I plan to get more ram sometime and I like gnome
